that seemed to holler to all their doubters, ''Take that!'' ''We just wanted to show the whole world we could play together,'' Anthony Morrow said after the duo's triumphant debut Monday night. We know there's a lot of doubt about that. Anthony Morrow scored 28 points in his return from a 15-game suspension for fighting and Allen Iverson added 23 in the Denver Nuggets' 115-98 rout of the Memphis Grizzlies. The two are out to prove two superstars can coexist.

mobile phones while he was editor of the News of the World. Insiders yesterday revealed that having to give evidence at the Tommy Sheridan trial was the tipping point for Andy Coulson . One source said: He was spending hours of his day trying to respond to stories about him. ''He had to take a week off before Christmas to prepare and give evidence in the Tommy Sheridan trial and was then being filmed and photographed arriving and leaving the court. ''He was right at the centre of the story instead of trying to manage it and he knew then that he had to go. Andy Coulson was the News of the World's editor in 2004, when the paper made allegations about Tommy Sheridan cheating on wife Gail Sheridan .
